titleStmt.title: Culpeper's directory for midwives: or, A guide for women. The second part. Discovering, 1. The diseases in the privities of women. 2. The diseases of the privie part. 3. The diseases of the womb ... 14. The diseases and symptoms in children.
titleStmt.author: Culpeper, Nicholas, 1616-1654.

notesStmt.note: Caption title, p. 1: The fourth book of practical physick of womens diseases.
Reproduction of original in Cushing Collection, Yale University Medical School Library.
